label.windowPosText: window settings, measurement from the floor to bottom and top of the window covered by the blind
label.windowAzimuthText: representing the orientation of the window to geographical north (in degrees) when the sun falls into the window (sun azimuth).
label.blindDefaultPosText: if none matches the following position will be used
label.overwriteText: manual overwrite of the blind position
label.TimeText: Time control: starting from midnight, the first matching line will used, where time is not used or time is less than now and where property is not used or true
label.sunControlActiveText: Restricting the extent to which direct sunlight may shine into the room

placeholder.OverwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain is place
placeholder.sunFloorLength: the extent to which direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor
placeholder.sunMinAltitude: (opt) minimum altitude of the sun for determination of blind position
placeholder.cloudValue: percentage of sky occluded by clouds
placeholder.cloudBlindPos: blind position when cloud-value is below threshold
placeholder.hysteresis: (opt) prevents changes due to sun in the given time
placeholder.name: Name

reasons.overwritePrio: position is overwritten by priority, no expire
reasons.default: position is set to default position because no other rule matches
reasons.hysteresis: Position is not changed because not enough time has passed since the last change

errors.invalid-blind-position: Given Blind-Position __pos__ is not a valid Position!
errors.getPropertyData: error getting property data: "__message__" skipping time
errors.intervaltoolong: The selected interval is too long!!
errors.hysteresistoolong: The selected hysteresis is too long!!
